1370: Henric was born in Marcktgang in 1370.
Got married to Volcwiif at age 37 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Volcwiif, at age 37.
1381: Had a son with Volcwiif, Woutgerus, at age 48.
1371: Lost daughter Volcwiif when Volcwiif was 2 years old.
1373: Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Imma, at age 40.
1374: Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Goneir, at age 41.
1375: Had a son with Volcwiif, Brame, at age 42.
Lost daughter Goneir when Goneir was 2 years old.
1376: Had a son with Volcwiif, Adolfus, at age 43.
1377: Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Hille, at age 44.
1379: Lost son Brame when Brame was 5 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1380: Had a son with Volcwiif, Reymbernus, at age 47.
